Activity: Incorporate feedback from @qatest-1 and @qatest-2 into the FAQ list.
Hold a team meeting with all Registered Nurses (@rn-1, @rn-2, @rn-3) to present the draft training plan and gather their input.
Create and integrate findings from the meeting into the training plan to reflect real-world feedback.
Finalize support materials based on the input from the team and create a checklist for each module.
Review finalized training plan and support materials with @clinlead-1 and @pchmp-1 for approval.
Start drafting a communication plan for announcing the upcoming training sessions to the hospital staff.
Email out finalized training plan and materials to @helpdesk-1 for distribution.
